speech: Let's begin with a 3-minute deep breathing exercise:-------1. Start by inhaling deeply through your nose for 4 seconds. 2. Slowly exhale through your mouth for 6 seconds. Take your time and let me know when you are done.

Here are some resources that can help you manage stress and anxiety effectively:
✅ Stress Management Strategies: [Mental Health Foundation](https://www.mentalhealth.org.uk/explore-mental-health/a-z-topics/stress)  
✅ Guided Breathing Exercises: [YouTube - Guided Breathing](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=inpok4MKVLM)  
✅ Sleep Improvement Tips: [Sleep Foundation](https://www.sleepfoundation.org/sleep-hygiene)                                   
 Take your time and let me know when you are done.

Exercise is a great way to manage stress and feel better! Try these routines:
🌿 Guided Breathing & Meditation → [Calm App](https://www.calm.com/)  
🏃 Outdoor Walking for Relaxation → [Healthline Walking Benefits](https://www.healthline.com/nutrition/10-benefits-of-walking)  
🏋️ Strength Training for Stress Reduction → [NHS Strength Training](https://www.nhs.uk/live-well/exercise/strength-and-flex-exercises/)             Take your time and let me know when you are done.
